results.title: Weeping willow
results.creator_credit: Adrian Wills, Nicholas Price, AFTRS and Louise Woodruff Sanz
results.brief_description:
She once described his dancing as being like the wind through the willow trees. She was his mentor and his best friend. She was his mum. Weeping Willow is the story of a dancer coming to terms with the death of his closest friend and biggest fan. It documents their journey to the present and into the future.
Features Gary Lang, Marilyn Miller, Lydia Miller, Joel Donahue
Contains some b&w images

results.title: True justice?
results.brief_description: Documentary containing sensitive material about the death, in 2004, of a young 17 year-old Aboriginal boy from Gamilaroi country (Walgett) known as TJ Hickey. Through interviews and news footage, the film attempts to establish the truth of what really happened to TJ whose “acccidental” death not only triggered a riot between the Redfern community and the police, but also conspiracy theories, rumours and media misinformation.
results.description: Documentary containing sensitive material about the death, in 2004, of a young 17 year-old Aboriginal boy from Gamilaroi country (Walgett) known as TJ Hickey. Through interviews and news footage, the film attempts to establish the truth of what really happened to TJ whose “acccidental” death not only triggered a riot between the Redfern community and the police, but also conspiracy theories, rumours and media misinformation.

results.title: Too little justice
results.creator_credit: Dean Francis, Justin Davies, AFTRS and Marcus Waters
results.brief_description:
“Everyday” racism escalates into violence as an indigenous school boy is forced to fight for dignity. When he is framed for drugs by a racist student, he realizes he is trapped in a cycle of systemic cultural bias.
Cast: George Barker, Shannon Cole
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dean Francis, Justin Davies, AFTRS and Marcus Waters

results.title: The Third note
results.creator_credit: Catriona McKenzie, Priscilla Collins, AFTRS and Lynne Vincent McCarthy
results.brief_description:
A blind woman and her Russian neighbour do battle with sound and music when he refuses to read a postcard for her. What starts as war ends in understanding.
Cast: Deborah Mailman, Leonid Dobrinski

Cast: Deborah Mailman, Leonid Dobrinski

results.creator_credit: Adrian Wills, Paola Garofali and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
The age-old struggle for understanding between generations is captured in this musical about finding the courage to be yourself.
Cast: Nick Simpson-Deeks, Ross McGregor, Ashley Swift

results.title: The Road home
results.creator_credit: Kelrick Martin, Robert Nugent and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Documentary about Roy Read who was raised an orphan and told he wasn’t Aboriginal - just “darker than others”. At Kinchela Boys’ Home he was subjected to the horrors of institutionalised life. Now 49 years later, he returns to face the demons of his past - and reconnect with the family he never knew he had. Contains archival b&w stills
results.description: Documentary about Roy Read who was raised an orphan and told he wasn’t Aboriginal - just “darker than others”. results.title: Redreaming the dark
results.creator_credit: Erica Glynn, Charlotte Seymour, AFTRS and Romaine Moreton
results.brief_description:
During an electricity blackout in the family apartment, a young intellectually challenged Black woman has her life suddenly thrown into turmoil. Her grandmother soothes the young girl, teaching her not only to embrace the dark but also to love her dark self. Together the three women “redream” the dark.
Cast: Emily Walker, Leah Purcell, Irma Woods
results.creator_credit_for_label: Erica Glynn, Charlotte Seymour, AFTRS and Romaine Moreton
results.description:

results.title: Range of experience
results.creator_credit: Maryella Hatfield, Anne Pratten, Lisa Duff, Marc Gillezeau and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
It is the future - a world where the ability to experience life’s basic emotions has been lost to humanity and Virtual Reality has replaced dreams. The company Range of Experience Productions Inc has invented the Dream Base Selector, a machine which enables users to re-live experiences once created naturally by the subconscious mind. But it soon becomes apparent that the technology is slightly faulty…
Cast: Soledad Cordeaux
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maryella Hatfield, Anne Pratten, Lisa Duff, Marc Gillezeau and AFTRS

results.title: Louise
results.creator_credit: Steven McGregor, Joe Weatherstone, AFTRS and Kelly Schilling
results.brief_description: A short documentary about a woman named Louise Mitchie who was born as a replacement child - a child conceived and born in order to help with the grief experienced by parents who had lost their first child in infancy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Steven McGregor, Joe Weatherstone, AFTRS and Kelly Schilling

results.title: Left lane ends
results.creator_credit: Sofya Gollan, Steve Pasvolsky, AFTRS and Alice Addison
results.brief_description:
Not paid sex, not Sleep-Eez, not working the late-night shift can help Danny sleep. Not until his ritual gets invaded by a girl.
Cast: Sam Lewis, Kate Beahan, Kris McQuade, Russell Cheek
